parameters.name: ConnectionStringPrefix
parameters.description:
The prefix of the new endpoint. The prefix of the endpoint must meet the following requirements:

*   The prefix can contain lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-).
*   The prefix must start with a letter and end with a digit or a letter.
*   The prefix must be 6 to 40 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBEndpointId
parameters.description:
The ID of the endpoint.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusterEndpoints](~~98205~~) operation to query endpoint details.

parameters.name: NetType
parameters.description: The network type of the endpoint. Set the value to **Public**.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the ECS security group.

parameters.name: VPCId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).
